attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
drugs,crime,murder,knives,respect,anti social behaviour, binge drinking,

has the country gone mad, 

if national service were brought back the country could gain respect to start with, the next generation would have trades and qualifications that are proven by a multi military agency.

This might take ten years to work through to the next generation of teens coming through the schools.but once adopted the respsct will return to the streets.

people having been on national service would be better placed in society to adapt their own way of life, away from what the street crime wave that is sweeping britain at the moment.

16 year olds would be required to either stay at school or college or national service until they were 19 years old

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
